rows.label: tlk70000047_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Being dubbed a knight of Iira is a
very special thing. It's a sign not only
of your bravery, but also our thanks.

rows.label: tlk70000047_04_msg0002
rows.name:
A sign that you truly hear the
pleas of our people.

rows.label: tlk70000047_04_msg0003
rows.name:
That you put your life on the line
to defend us from the Grail.

rows.label: tlk70000047_04_msg0004
rows.name:
We'll make sure to pass on the story
of your deeds, so that we as a people
will never forget.

rows.label: tlk70000047_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Just like my mother told me stories
of the great knight Ornella, I'll tell
my daughter stories about you.

rows.label: tlk70000047_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Even though my daughter is sick...
Even though Iira has awakened...

rows.label: tlk70000047_04_msg0007
rows.name:
I trust in you, and I know you'll deliver
us safely from the forces that threaten
us. I know someday I'll tell your tale.

rows.label: tlk70000047_04_msg0008
rows.name: Come back safely to us, you hear?
